title: Marcellin9
author: Marcellin9
content: The undercover video of Pfizer executive admitting his company's doing of manipulating coronavirus and mutating it for insane profit went viral online yesterday but soon later YouTube removed the Project Veritas Video. This thread is not intended to discuss the truth of manipulating COVID virus for profit but ask a simple question: How can we know the truth if the big corporations like Pfizer control the social media, goverments and every possible channel that might damage their dirty business behind the curtain ? If not contained, they are growing into some big evil like Thanos. Wiping out population on the planet would not be only in movies !
